problem.markdown: >>What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Wainwright Building in St. Louis use?<< (x) a moment-resisting frame ( ) a braced frame ( ) a shearwall ( ) a tube-framed system ( ) don’t know [explanation] The Wainwright building was one of the first taller buildings and like most of the early buildings used a moment-resisting steel frame. [explanation]
problem.p: What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Wainwright Building in St. Louis use?

choicegroup.label: What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Wainwright Building in St. Louis use?

div.p: The Wainwright building was one of the first taller buildings and like most of the early buildings used a moment-resisting steel frame.
